sink.preCopyScript:
TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.ServiceNow_JSON_Stage

TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.ServiceNow_Flattened

text.value:
@concat(
  'INSERT INTO Pipeline_Execution_Log_Script (PL_DatafactoryName, PL_Name, PL_RunId, PL_TriggerName, PL_TriggerTime, PL_TriggerType, PL_ExecutionTime_insec) VALUES (''',
  pipeline().DataFactory, ''',''',
  pipeline().Pipeline, ''',''',
  pipeline().RunId, ''',''',
  pipeline().TriggerName, ''',''',
  formatDateTime(pipeline().TriggerTime,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), ''',''',
  pipeline().TriggerType, ''',',
  'DATEDIFF(second, ''', formatDateTime(variables('StartTime'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), ''',''', formatDateTime(variables('StopTime'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), '''))'
)
